entities.description: Indicates whether the respondent's father or mother is in the military.
Indicates whether the respondent's son or daughter is in the military.
Indicates whether the respondent's sister or brother is in the military.

relationships.description: Indicates if the respondent has a parent in the military.
Indicates if the respondent has a child in the military.
Indicates if the respondent has a sibling in the military.
